nodes.text: The Gorgodon was an aggressive species of reptilian native to the planet Ilum. They were known to be extremely dangerous.

The Gorgodon was a large, aggressive reptile hailing from the planet Ilum. Gorgodons stood upright, and had long, powerful arms, short legs, and an axe-shaped head. They were equipped with claws and teeth.
These massive creatures had thick, orange skin, covered by a shaggy coat of dark gray fur, with only the head showing. Gorgodons were strong and could withstand almost any punishment. It is believed they can even shrug off blaster bolts. Gorgodons often attacked without any reason.
Gorgodons appeared in the Fantasy Flight Games sourcebook Nexus of Power.
